form.title: Register to Become an Agent
form.description: Please fill in the information below to register as an agent
form.notRegistered: You have not registered as an agent

noteItems.checkInfo: Please carefully review your information before submitting the registration.
noteItems.approvalProcess: Agent registration requests will be reviewed within 24-48 business hours.
noteItems.earnings: Commission will be calculated based on the transaction value of users you refer.

benefits.commission: Earn commissions from transactions of users you refer
benefits.dashboard: Access the agent dashboard to track performance
benefits.support: Receive priority support from the customer service team

validation.phoneMin: Phone number must be at least 10 digits
validation.phoneMax: Phone number must be no more than 15 digits
validation.bankAccountRequired: Bank account number cannot be empty
validation.accountHolderRequired: Account holder name cannot be empty

referral.description: Below is your referral link. When users register through this link, they will be associated with your agent account.
referral.shareDescription: Share this link with friends, colleagues, or on social media to invite them to register through your agency.
